description: The Licence Holder shall provide written confirmation (including  drawing/s that clearly detail and show the <<hydropower  scheme/impounding works>> as it has been built) to the  Agency from an independent qualified civil engineer, or other  suitably qualified person, that the <<hydropower  scheme/impounding works>> has been constructed in  accordance with the submitted specification and drawings  specified in condition <<number>> of this licence (or such  minor amendments to these documents that have been  accepted in writing by the Agency).
